title: Emperor Jahangir and expanding Mughal power

content.description:
Image 1

MUGHAL EMPEROR JAHANGIR HOLDING A GLOBE, SOUTH ASIA, 1617

Courtesy of Sotheby’s Picture Library

Image 2

MUGHAL EMPEROR JAHANGIR HOLDING A PICTURE OF THE VIRGIN MARY, SOUTH ASIA, 1620

Jahangir holding a picture of the Madonna, inscribed in Persian: Jahangir Shah, Mughal, 1620 (detail of 57393) / National Museum of India, New Delhi, India / Bridgeman Images
content.question: The portrait of Emperor Jahangir in Image 1 was most likely a symbolic representation of which of the following?

choices.label: The expanding power of the Mughal Empire
The extended travels of Emperor Jahangir to Eurasian pilgrimage sites
The Mughal Empire’s control of global trade networks

content.answer: The expanding power of the Mughal Empire

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
